parameters.name: mms1_dis_errorflags_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS 32-bit vector of data-quality indicators at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_compressionloss_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS compression lossless/lossy indicator at survey-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_steptable_parity_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS step table parity, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_startdelphi_count_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) count at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_startdelphi_angle_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) angle at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_sector_despinp_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS sector de-Spin P value, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_px_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" +X_DSC during this burst

parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" -X_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_py_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" +Y_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_my_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" -Y_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_pz_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" +Z_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_mz_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion energy spectrum "near" -Z_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energyspectr_omni_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS omni-directional ion energy spectrum during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_spectr_bg_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion background energy during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_numberdensity_bg_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion background number density during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_numberdensity_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion number density during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_numberdensity_brst_noerr
parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DIS ion number density during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_numberdensity_err_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS ion number density error during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_densityextrapolation_low_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS estimated (via extrapolation to 0) contribution to density integral below 10eV

parameters.name: mms1_dis_densityextrapolation_high_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS estimated (via extrapolation to infinity) contribution to density integral above 30keV

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity estimated spintone vector in DBCS during this burst

parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity DBCS vector during this burst

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity GSE vector during this burst

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity estimated spintone vector in GSE during this burst

parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity GSE vector during this burst

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity spintone vector in DBCS during this burst

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS ion bulk-velocity spintone vector in GSE during this burst
